item.title: Laboratoire Scénographique - MAPP_MTL x Moment Factory
item.author: kiennt2609@gmail.com (Kien Nguyen-Tuan)
item.description: In September 2024 I had the opportunity to be apart of the small group who worked on the closing party of the MAPP_MTL festival which took place on September 29th 2024 at Moment Factory.
